Text.text: Virinchy P was recognized as the SAP Community Network (SCN) Member of the Month in February 2015.
His expertise in SAP mobile technologies is well-respected in the SCN community, where is a valued member and contributor.
He makes active contributions in numerous SCN spaces, posting informative blogs and answering questions posted by SCN colleagues
-Caroleigh Deneen - UX Designer, Information Architect and Gamification Consultant - SAP
Virinchy is passionate and committed about any work he takes on.
Has excellent knowledge in SMP SDK and frameworks and has done commendable job in creating a good set of applications and have hosted them on the SAP store.
The go-getter he is, he has been constantly updating himself to the market demands and dynamics and has delivered excellent results.
He has also been very active in the SCN contributing to the community at large. Good resource to have in a customer focused, result-oriented team. Wish him all the best.
-Srinivas Nagarajan - Ex Director at WiseMen Solutions
